game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find and retrieve the lost artifact
game.description: The artifact was last seen in the Forest of Woe, guarded by a fearsome dragon. With preparation and courage, recover the artifact and return it to its rightful place.
game.reward: 50 gold coins and a legendary sword

tasks.objective: Acquire a map of the Forest of Woe
tasks.description: Visit the local cartographer in the kingdom's library to acquire the map of the Forest of Woe
Enter the Forest of Woe and engage in battle with the dragon to defeat it first before getting the artifact
Once the dragon is defeated, search for the artifact in the dragon's lair and bring it back
